verses.verse: Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Bethany <S%G963><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was, whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> they made <S%G4160><s%> Him a supper <S%G1173><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> and Martha <S%G3136><s%> was serving; <S%G1247><s%> but Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was one <S%G1520><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> reclining <S%G345><s%> [at the table] with Him.

Mary <S%G3137><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> a pound <S%G3046><s%> of very <S%G4186><s%> costly <S%G4186><s%> perfume <S%G3464><s%> of pure <S%G4101><s%> nard, <S%G3487><s%> and anointed <S%G218><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> His feet <S%G4228><s%> with her hair; <S%G2359><s%> and the house <S%G3614><s%> was filled <S%G4137><s%> with the fragrance <S%G3744><s%> of the perfume. <S%G3464><s%>
But Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> who was intending <S%G3195><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> Him, said, <S%G3004><s%>

"Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> was this <S%G3778><s%> perfume <S%G3464><s%> not sold <S%G4097><s%> for three <S%G5145><s%> hundred <S%G5145><s%> denarii, <S%G1220><s%> and given <S%G1325><s%> to poor <S%G4434><s%> [people]?"

Now <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> not because <S%G3754><s%> he was concerned <S%G3199><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the poor, <S%G4434><s%> but because <S%G3754><s%> he was a thief, <S%G2812><s%> and as he had <S%G2192><s%> the money <S%G1101><s%> box, <S%G1101><s%> he used to pilfer <S%G941><s%> what was put <S%G906><s%> into it.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Let <S%G863><s%> her alone, <S%G863><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that she may keep <S%G5083><s%> it for the day <S%G2250><s%> of My burial. <S%G1780><s%>
"For the poor <S%G4434><s%> you always <S%G3842><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> with you, but you do not always <S%G3842><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> Me."

The great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> learned <S%G1097><s%> that He was there; <S%G1563><s%> and they came, <S%G2064><s%> not for Jesus' sake <S%G1223><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but that they might also <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> He raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
But the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> took <S%G1011><s%> counsel <S%G1011><s%> that they might put <S%G615><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> to death <S%G615><s%> also; <S%G2532><s%>

because <S%G3754><s%> on account <S%G1223><s%> of him many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were going <S%G5217><s%> away, <S%G5217><s%> and were believing <S%G4100><s%> in Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

On the next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> the great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> who had come <S%G2064><s%> to the feast, <S%G1859><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was coming <S%G2064><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%>

took <S%G2983><s%> the branches <S%G902><s%> of the palm <S%G5404><s%> trees, <S%G5404><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out to meet <S%G5222><s%> Him, and [began] to cry <S%G2905><s%> out, "Hosanna! <S%G5614><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is He who comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>"
And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> finding <S%G2147><s%> a young <S%G3678><s%> donkey, <S%G3678><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> on it; as it is written, <S%G1125><s%>
"Fear <S%G5399><s%> not, daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Zion; <S%G4622><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> your King <S%G935><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> seated <S%G2521><s%> on a donkey's colt. <S%G4454><s%>"

These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> did not understand <S%G1097><s%> at the first; <S%G4413><s%> but when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was glorified, <S%G1392><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> they remembered <S%G3403><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> were written <S%G1125><s%> of Him, and that they had done <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to Him.

And so <S%G3767><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> who were with Him when <S%G3753><s%> He called <S%G5455><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> out of the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> and raised <S%G1453><s%> him from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> were bearing <S%G3140><s%> Him witness. <S%G3140><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> went <S%G5221><s%> and met <S%G5221><s%> Him, because <S%G3754><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> that He had performed <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> sign. <S%G4592><s%>

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G1438><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> "You see <S%G2334><s%> that you are not doing <S%G5623><s%> any <S%G3762><s%> good; <S%G5623><s%> look, <S%G2396><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> has gone <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Him."

Now <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> were certain <S%G5100><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> among <S%G1537><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were going <S%G305><s%> up to worship <S%G4352><s%> at the feast; <S%G1859><s%>

these <S%G3778><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Philip, <S%G5376><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was from Bethsaida <S%G966><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and [began to] ask <S%G2065><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> we wish <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>"
Philip <S%G5376><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and told <S%G3004><s%> Andrew; <S%G406><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> and Philip <S%G5376><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and they told <S%G3004><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The hour <S%G5610><s%> has come <S%G2064><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> to be glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> falls <S%G4098><s%> into the earth <S%G1093><s%> and dies, <S%G599><s%> it remains <S%G3306><s%> by itself <S%G846><s%> alone; <S%G3441><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> it dies, <S%G599><s%> it bears <S%G5342><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

"He who loves <S%G5368><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> it; and he who hates <S%G3404><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> shall keep <S%G5442><s%> it to life <S%G2222><s%> eternal. <S%G166><s%>

"If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> serves <S%G1247><s%> Me, let him follow <S%G190><s%> Me; and where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall My servant <S%G1249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be; if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> serves <S%G1247><s%> Me, the Father <S%G3962><s%> will honor <S%G5091><s%> him.

" Now <S%G3568><s%> My soul <S%G5590><s%> has become troubled; <S%G5015><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> shall I say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Father, <S%G3962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> Me from this <S%G3778><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>'? But for this <S%G3778><s%> purpose I came <S%G2064><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

"Father, <S%G3962><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> Thy name. <S%G3686><s%>" There came <S%G2064><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> out of heaven: <S%G3772><s%> "I have both <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> it, and will glorify <S%G1392><s%> it again. <S%G3825><s%>"

The multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> who stood <S%G2476><s%> by and heard <S%G191><s%> it, were saying <S%G3004><s%> that it had thundered <S%G1027><s%>; <S%G1096><s%> others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "An angel <S%G32><s%> has spoken <S%G2980><s%> to Him."
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> has not come <S%G1096><s%> for My sake, <S%G1223><s%> but for your sakes. <S%G1223><s%>

"Now <S%G3568><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> is upon this <S%G3778><s%> world; <S%G2889><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> the ruler <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> shall be cast <S%G1544><s%> out.
"And I, if <S%G1437><s%> I be lifted <S%G5312><s%> up from the earth, <S%G1093><s%> will draw <S%G1670><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3956><s%> to Myself. <S%G1683><s%>"
But He was saying <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> to indicate <S%G4591><s%> the kind <S%G4169><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> by which <S%G4169><s%> He was to die. <S%G599><s%>

The multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "We have heard <S%G191><s%> out of the Law <S%G3551><s%> that the Christ <S%G5547><s%> is to remain <S%G3306><s%> forever; <S%G165><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> can You say, <S%G3004><s%> 'The Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be lifted <S%G5312><s%> up'? Who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "For a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G5550><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> is among <S%G1722><s%> you. Walk <S%G4043><s%> while <S%G5613><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> that darkness <S%G4653><s%> may not overtake <S%G2638><s%> you; he who walks <S%G4043><s%> in the darkness <S%G4653><s%> does not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> he goes. <S%G5217><s%>

"While <S%G5613><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in the light, <S%G5457><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may become <S%G1096><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>" These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> and He departed <S%G565><s%> and hid <S%G2928><s%> Himself from them.
But though He had performed <S%G4160><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them, [yet] they were not believing <S%G4100><s%> in Him;

that the word <S%G3056><s%> of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has believed <S%G4100><s%> our report <S%G189><s%>? And to whom <S%G5101><s%> has the arm <S%G1023><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> been revealed <S%G601><s%>?"
For this <S%G3778><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> they could <S%G1410><s%> not believe, <S%G4100><s%> for Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%>

"He has blinded <S%G5186><s%> their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and He hardened <S%G4456><s%> their heart; <S%G2588><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they see <S%G3708><s%> with their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and perceive <S%G3539><s%> with their heart, <S%G2588><s%> and be converted, <S%G4762><s%> and I heal <S%G2390><s%> them."
These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he saw <S%G3708><s%> His glory, <S%G1391><s%> and he spoke <S%G2980><s%> of Him.

Nevertheless <S%G3676><s%> <S%G3305><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him, but because <S%G1223><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> they were not confessing <S%G3670><s%> [Him,] lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should be put <S%G656><s%> out of the synagogue; <S%G656><s%>
for they loved <S%G25><s%> the approval <S%G1391><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> the approval <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out and said, <S%G3004><s%> "He who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me does not believe <S%G4100><s%> in Me, but in Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.
"And he who beholds <S%G2334><s%> Me beholds <S%G2334><s%> the One who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.
"I have come <S%G2064><s%> [as] light <S%G5457><s%> into the world, <S%G2889><s%> that everyone <S%G3956><s%> who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me may not remain <S%G3306><s%> in darkness. <S%G4653><s%>

"And if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> My sayings, <S%G4487><s%> and does not keep <S%G5442><s%> them, I do not judge <S%G2919><s%> him; for I did not come <S%G2064><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> but to save <S%G4982><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

"He who rejects <S%G114><s%> Me, and does not receive <S%G2983><s%> My sayings, <S%G4487><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> one who judges <S%G2919><s%> him; the word <S%G3056><s%> I spoke <S%G2980><s%> is what <S%G1565><s%> will judge <S%G2919><s%> him at the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

"For I did not speak <S%G2980><s%> on My own <S%G1683><s%> initiative, <S%G1683><s%> but the Father <S%G3962><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me has given <S%G1325><s%> Me commandment, <S%G1785><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>

"And I know <S%G3609><s%> that His commandment <S%G1785><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the things I speak, <S%G2980><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> has told <S%G3004><s%> Me."
